**Interrogation Scene**

**Detective James:** So, you're telling me you wonder what this is about? (pauses) Can you explain that?

**Suspect:** (nervously) I... I don't know. I just woke up and I'm here. I don't remember how I got here.

**Detective James:** (skeptical) Save it, kid. We've been over this. You're not buying that, are you? You're in trouble, and you need to answer my questions.

**Suspect:** (defensively) I'm telling you the truth! I don't remember anything!

**Detective James:** (firmly) Look, I don't have time for games. You're going to have to do better than that if you want to get out of here. What do you remember about this place? Anything at all?

**Suspect:** (hesitantly) I... I think I saw a clock. It said 11 o'clock.

**Detective James:** (sternly) A clock? What about that clock? What did it mean to you?

**Suspect:** (nervously) I don't know... I just saw it. It was just a clock.

**Detective James:** (firmly) Alright, alright. We'll get to the clock later. For now, I want to know what you're doing here. What's your name?

**Suspect:** (nervously) My name is... um... (pauses) I don't know.

**Detective James:** (angrily) Don't play dumb with me! You're going to have to do better than that. You're in trouble, and you need to answer my questions.
